name: Zeptris
description:
Zeptris is inspired by Tetris™️, the famous Russian game with blocks of different shapes falling down, but here you have realistic physics where blocks collide, rotate, and move according to their mass and the applied forces.

This creates a totally new gameplay, where you have to pay attention to weights, balance and all the forces involved.

Be also careful not to let blocks drop off the platform.

Three game modes are available:

  • Classic: complete lines of 10 pieces (or more)
  • 80%: pack the blocks to fill at least the 80% of the area up to the highest block
  • Load it: just load as much weight as you can without losing blocks.

How to play

  • Rotate counterclockwise/clockwise with Q and E keys
  • Move left/right by one step with A and D or  left/right arrow keys
  • Let the block fall with S or down arrow key
  • You can also drag left, right or down with your mouse or finger for more precise movements
  • And you can let all non-scoring block fall off the platform with SPACEBAR (but you'll get a penalty, so use this with care)
  • Pause the game with ESC

Note: only blocks that are placed in a stable, straight and orthogonal position can score points; if some blocks are askew, you can try to straighten them by hitting them.

For Android mobiles, get the Zeptris app from Google Play for a better experience.
